Name: Truck World: Driving School
About the game: Learn to drive your rig Discover all the intricate controls necessary to successfully drive a large rig in otherwise inhospitable conditions of the Outback Perform difficult maneuvers Undertake several basic and advanced challenges and lessons to fully master tricky maneuvers that will come in handy in difficult or tight spots Get the perfect score Embrace the challenge and commit yourself to getting the perfect score on a variety of advanced graded lessons Handle difficult cargo Find out what it takes to drive a truck with various kinds of cargo and trailers Tinker with controls in the cabin Become familiar with the interaction with the inside of the truck, as well as with the mirror and seat settings
